<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Caligni Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=66)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Caligni stalkers are often leaders of caligni enclaves.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Caligni Stalker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=66)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Caligni" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=210" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 51</row>

**Perception** +10; greater darkvision, light blindness

**Languages**
[Caligni](/Languages.aspx?ID=28), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +5

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43) (2), [Black Smear Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=485) (6 doses)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 60
(death flame)

**Death Flame** ([light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100)) When the stalker dies, their body combusts in a flash of white-hot flame. All creatures in a 20-foot burst take 5d6 fire damage (DC 21 basic Reflex save). The stalker’s gear and treasure are unaffected by the flames and are left in a pile where they died.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortsword +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d6+7 piercing plus [_black smear poison_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=485)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 19
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Obscuring Mist](/Spells.aspx?ID=210) (at will)

**Double Slice** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The caligni stalker makes two Strikes against the same target, one with each of their shortswords. The stalker combines the damage of any attacks that hit and applies [_precision damage_](/Rules.aspx?ID=340), [_resistances_](/Rules.aspx?ID=346), and [_weaknesses_](/Rules.aspx?ID=345) only once. Both attacks count toward the stalker’s multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks.

**Encircling Command** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16)) Each caligni creeper within 30 feet of the stalker can [_Step_](/Actions.aspx?ID=87). Each creeper can benefit from Encircling Command only once per round.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The Caligni Stalker deals 1d6 extra [_precision_](/Rules.aspx?ID=340) damage to [_flat-footed_](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-18" />
name: Caligni Stalker
